00002         Purpose:  read amber-style prmtop files into an
00003                 assembly for later use. */

00005 #include "AMBER/amber_prmtop.h"
00006 
00007 assembly load_amber_prmtop(fileset F){
00008 amber_prmtop *P;
00009 assembly A;
00010 
00011 // initialize the amber prmtop info
00012 P=(amber_prmtop *)calloc(1,sizeof(amber_prmtop));
00013 amber_prmtop_init(P); 
00014 
00015 // load info as-is into sections
00016 read_amber_prmtop_asis(F,P);
00017 
00018 // parse sections into a glylib assembly structure
00019 A=parse_amber_prmtop(P);
00020 
00021 return A;
00022 }
